text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the ROG G703GX Desktop Replacement Gaming Laptop, GeForce RTX 2080, Intel Core i9-8950HK Processor, 17.3" Full HD 144 Hz 3 ms G-SYNC, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, RGB, Windows 10 Pro - G703GX-PS91K is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ROG G703GX Desktop Replacement Gaming Laptop, GeForce RTX 2080, Intel Core i9-8950HK Processor, 17.3" Full HD 144 Hz 3 ms G-SYNC, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, RGB, Windows 10 Pro - G703GX-PS91K!
